channel.title: Using portals only if you kill npc
channel.description: Okay so I'm making a minigame were you have to kill npc's and then use a port to get to next npc (all npc's have improved lvl and hp)and at the end you get 100m. The problem is I can just click on the portals without fighting to get the gp. Any suggestions on how to make out so you can't use portal unless you kill the npc first? And thanks for help in advance.

item.title: Using portals only if you kill npc
item.dc:creator: @alltimenewb alltimenewb
item.description:
@alltimenewb wrote:

Okay I thought this would be a simple fix but it wasnt. I got 8 errors using that, so I changed it a bit and now I get 4 errors. Any help would be great here is a pic of the errors I am getting if anyone can help or give me a better code that would be awesome.

edit: its not letting me post the pic so I will add a linkhttp://imgur.com/wUkNk

Read full topic
item.source: Using portals only if you kill npc

item.title: Using portals only if you kill npc
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Add a boolean check to make sure that the player has killed the NPC.

if (hasKilled) {}

Read full topic
